name: Mary Kathryn "M.K." Jones
what_you_do: Helps SaaS startups tie their customer journey to their profit through category design, conversational design, and customer experience optimization.
who_you_serve: SaaS startups and innovative founding teams
offering: Category design, conversational design, and customer experience optimization services to help SaaS startups increase revenue and scale.
social_proof: Featured in Entrepreneur, Zapier, and other notable publications. Podcast host with proven success stories from CEO guests.
signature_programs: Instant Clarity (2-hour consulting session), CEO M.I.S.C.H.I.E.F. Maker Podcast
business_focus: Helping SaaS startups and innovative founding teams optimize their customer experience to increase revenue and scale.
service_provided: Category design, conversational design, customer experience optimization
